name: OMSI Scenery Object Configuration File
summary: Configuration file created by OMSI The Bus Simulator, an omnibus driving simulator; contains configuration data for scenery objects that appear during gameplay, such as trees and buildings; can be customized; similar to other OMSI configuration files like .HUM , .SLI , .BUS , and .OVH files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: MR Software OMSI The Bus Simulator 2
